name: Slipstream Racer
description:
You've rocked up to the starting line, ready to secure 1st place and then you check your fuel gauge, 5L. Fortunately, your car incorporates state-of-the-art technology allowing you to turn your fellow drivers' exhaust fumes back into petrol!

All art and SFX made by me.

Thank you to 'djsaryon' for the in-game music.

Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2021 (Stronger Together) 'against' WhatsADev who uploaded Stronger Together After Death
